borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <div>The proposed first floor balcony by reason of siting and design would result in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss of privacy to neighbouring occupiers, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</div><div>- Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);</div><div>&nbsp;- Policies DMD 1 and DMD 6 of the Draft Local Plan (<span style="font-size: 11pt;">Regulation 19 Consultation&nbsp;Version, October 2020</span>);</div><div>- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</div><div>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</div><div>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).</div>

<div><span style="font-size: 11pt;">The proposed front porch and first floor balcony by reason of presenting a mismatching&nbsp;design, introduces an unbalanced feature to the front and rear elevations of this dwellinghouse and&nbsp;disrupts the&nbsp;uniformity within the wider streetscene.&nbsp;</span>This is considered harmful to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</div><div>- Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);</div><div>- Policies SP 2, DMD 1 and DMD 6 of the Draft Local Plan (<span style="font-size: 11pt;">Regulation 19 Consultation&nbsp;Version, October 2020</span>);&nbsp;</div><div>- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</div><div>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</div><div>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).&nbsp;</div>
description: Construction of front porch, first floor balcony at rear elevation and conversion of the Garage to provide  habitable accommodation.
